about_the_game:
Light Bearers 2 is a fast paced game that pits an evil Shadow against a party of clumsy, goofy Light Bears.

The Light Bears try to evade corruption, surviving until the Pool of Light appears and they can escape. A bear that gets tagged, can still be saved during their transition phase. If they are not, that bear joins the Shadow in their hunt of the Light Bears!

Better and Bigger

Light Bearers 2 builds off of its predecessor, all systems have been redesigned from the ground up to support a richer gameplay experience.
Sporting the world's best hide and seek movement mechanics, Light Bearers 2 has raised the skill floor so that anyone can jump in and become a parkour master!

  • After 7 years of lessons learned, each Shadow has been remastered to best support their design and fun factor.
  • New Shadows added.
  • New maps with unique mechanics to spice up your Friday nights.
  • Many Light Bearers 1 maps returning with modifications and updates.
  • New Body system, each body now gives you unique abilities as a Light and Shadow bear.
  • Reworked mechanics that offer hiders much more freedom.
  • Familiars that give unique passive abilities.
  • and much much more!

Same Fat Bomb Humor

The game is still goofy, punny, silly, dumb and slightly offensive.
If you've played our other games, you know what to expect!

Replayability

Light Bearers 2 introduces a new system called Chaos Infusions to make every round feel special.
Between the Chaos Infusion system, body abilities, familiars, remastered and new shadows, new and returning maps, there is a ton of replay-ability value to keep you engaged for as long as you need.

No Renting Us Your Wallet

Light Bearers 2 is a free to play game, this allows a large chunk of the game to be experienced without ever having to pay anything. We offer 1 DLC that can be purchased that unlocks everything else. One payment, one time.
Servers are hosted by players utilizing Steam's awesome network. This means that even if we were to vanish in an unprecedented rapture, you'd still have access to the game to play with your friends or enemies!

content_descriptors.notes: Light Bearers 2 contains the following. Swearing, drug references, suggestive dancing and humor.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4th gen i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is what is needed for 60 FPS, it could probably be pushed with slightly older hardware.
